official_title: To require the promulgation of standards for the cleanup of radiologically contaminated sites.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promulgate standards to protect public health, safety, and the environment from the hazards of radiologically contaminated sites. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To require the promulgation of standards for the cleanup of radiologically contaminated sites.
